Name: From Beyond Prologue
About the game: In the winter of 1910, professor Crawford Tillinghast mounted an expedition into the mountains of Europe. He went searching for a lost village shrouded in the myths and rumors of a bygone era. This is his story... A Point and click adventure horror game, presented to you with haunting Nintendo inspired graphics and sound. Featuring: • 8-bit NES era graphics and sound • Classic Macventure style gameplay • Larger than the original Shadowgate Play if you dare... Adventure Games Podcast - 'The writing is very good, the story is engaging, it makes you want to know what happened to this village.'
